p: To create a useful delivery system, the most challenging task is to trigger and modulate the release of the encapsulated substances. Light [ 15], temperature [ 16] and pH change [ 17] are only some of the several triggers that have been investigated by scientists during the last decades to boost microcapsule wall morphological changes. Photo-responsive materials for the design of capsules shell are the subject of great interest, as the modification in their micro-/nano-structures occurs when external light is used as a remote-control trigger [ 18, 19, 20, 21, 22, 23].
